verbose_text: Sabin related viruses have limited divergence in the capsid protein (VP1) nucleotide sequences from the corresponding OPV (Sabin) strain : poliovirus types 1 and 3 (PV1 and PV3) are < = 1% divergent; poliovirus type 2 (PV2) is < = 0.6% divergent.
